sn35.126:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā nāḷandāyaṃ viharati pāvārikambavane.
sn35.126:4.2: Atha kho, upāli gahapati, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.126:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho, upāli gahapati, bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.126:4.4: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti?
sn35.126:4.5: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti?
sn35.126:4.7: “Ayaṃ kho, gahapati, hetu ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti.
